screen_desc: The screenshot displays the Walmart mobile website showing a Cyber Monday deal on a Lenovo tablet, reduced from $199 to $129. A banner at the top promotes Cyber deals, and there's a cart icon with a $11.97 value. Below, users can select options for picking up or having items delivered, and there's a prompt to download the Walmart shopping app.
action_think: The user wants to clear the cart and add a USB-B item. The current screen shows the Walmart website with a cart icon displaying a total of $11.97. To clear the cart, I need to access it first. The best course of action is to click on the cart icon to view its contents.
action_plan: Click on the cart icon to view its contents.
Remove all items from the cart to clear it.
Search for 'USB-B' using the search bar.
Add a relevant USB-B item to the cart.
action_desc: Click on the cart icon located at the top right.
action_result:
By clicking on the shopping cart icon located at the top right, the cart page has been opened. This shows that the item currently in the cart is a Belkin USB C to USB A cable priced at $11.97. 

This action brings us closer to the user request, which is to add a USB-B cable to the cart. However, the next step will involve searching for and adding the desired USB-B cable to the cart, as it is not yet in the cart. The current screen shows the cart with an item that isn't a USB-B cable, so the task is not yet fully complete.
prev_action_result:
By clicking the cancel button located at the top right of the screen, the action dismissed the current overlay or pop-up (likely the promotional offer or app advertisement). This action did not directly impact the cart, so the cart remains unchanged.

To move closer to the user request of clearing the cart, additional steps are needed. Specifically, the user should go to the cart and remove the existing items.

This action helps by decluttering the screen and may bring the user closer to managing the cart but does not yet clear it. More actions are needed to clear the cart and then add a USB-B to it.
